resources.string: Thank you for purchasing gMusic Sniper. \n This is a non root app, but some functions are easier if superuser and busybox are installed. For more information on root/rooting your devices, look your device up on RootzWiki or XDA.
Warning, this is an intensive task. You may get an option to "FC" or "Wait". This is normal, please choose wait and let the process finish.

Congratulations, your offline gMusic is now available to all music players. You may need to reboot or unmount/mount your sdcard for the media scanner to acknowledge the new tracks. For the ID3 tags to be located, root and busybox will be needed.
Unfortunatly, busybox was not found installed on your device. ID3 tags will not be able to be retrieved.
Something went wrong. Try reloading the app.
